free: #e Oh, your family member, what was his name...  They passed you and Awi's house to ask your husband to go to Paran together, but your husband did not go there.
#c 喔.. 就是妳們的家，是誰呢，妳和Awi（Tiwas Pawan傅阿有的丈夫）的家，他們經過那兒，邀妳先生一起（到霧社），但妳先生沒去。
#e He did not go there.
#c 是，（他）沒去。
#e But your mother and some people went there. Not...
#c 而妳媽媽他們卻去了霧社，沒...
#e You said they went where?
#c （去）哪裡？
#e They went to Paran?
#c 他們去霧社？
#e How come you mixed them up?
#c 你怎麼把它們搞混了？
#n pgmax-un (物品混合、混放；事件混淆)
#e When Temu Mona came to see me, they had not yet planned (to kill the Japanese).
#c 當Temu Mona來探望我的時候，那時還沒起義（殺日本人）。
#n m-ita在此情境為「邀請」之意；也可作字面意解，為「探望」之意
#n Menaq ka "About the thing that I have told... 我說的那個事情呢... "
#n Temu Mona: Truwan village's leader. Truwan的頭目.
#e At that time ...  You are right.
#c 那時.. 是的。
#n This part is talking about People who revolved Japanese。這部分提起義的人。
#e It was the next day when Baso passed your house in the early morning.
#c 是...  隔天，隔天的一大清早Baso經過那兒（你家）。
#n It refers to the following morning隔天早上。
#n IU21 mgrebu sounds like mrebu. Mgrebu聽起來mrebu.
#e On the second day, they killed the policemen at Mbehu. My house was here, just across the bridge.
#c 到了第二天...殺了馬赫坡派出所(駐在所)（的日警）。我家在這裡，這兒是橋頭對面的一端。
#n 日文借字：駐在所(cyuzayso) = 派出所(hasuso)
#e Mhebu village was there.
#c 馬赫坡部落在那邊。
#e At that time, Baso passed your house, is that right?
#c Baso（那時）經過你家，是嗎？
#n Baso指Baso Mona。
#e That road (our house is right beside that road), was our road bounded to Baran. He did not enter our house.
#c 那是道路（我家就在路旁），那是我們（前往霧社）的路，沒進去我家。
#n moda「經過」或「進入」之意。
#e He said to me when standing on the road,
#c 是從（站在）路上對我說的。
#n m-lawa (大聲叫)。
#e "Do not go to Paran. Stay here."
#c 他對我說「不要去霧社，留在這裡」。
#n 「霧社」為清朝官方命名；Baran原意為「苦棟樹」。
#e I myself did not want to go there.
#c 我自己是不想去的。
#e Did your mother go there?
#c 是你媽媽她們去了嗎？
#e My mother said she would go there.
#c 我媽媽說她要去。
#n What she meant to say is 'maha ku ka yaku si bubu mu'. 她應該說'maha ku ka yaku si bubu mu'.
#e She carried back one basket of clothes.
#c 她揹回一簍（的衣物）。
#n During the accident, Seediq woman went to look for cloth that Japanese left.事件發生後，女性去找日本人留下的衣服。
#n bruru女用揹簍。
#n Seediq習俗不拿敵人的物品，以免遭到報復。
#e Are they the Japanese's clothes?
#c 是日本人的衣物嗎？
#e Yes, it was the Japanese's clothes.
#c 是日本人的衣物。
#e I do not know where those clothes went.
#c 那些衣物不知到哪裡去了，是否...
#e She brought those clothes. Did she share them with you?
#c 那些衣物被她帶到.. 她有分給妳嗎？
#n asu為「分給」字根; asu亦為「獨木舟」、「豬飼料槽」，現在為「船」意。
#e She brought them to Mhebu Village.
#c 她把衣服帶到馬赫坡部落。
#e No, she didn't.
#c 沒（分給我）。
#n de= deheya
#e (The Japanese aircraft) came to Paran and then returned.
#c 來到霧社上空即折返（指日本偵察機）。
#e Did you all see it?
#c 妳們看到了嗎？
#e We saw it since they flew just above us in the sky.
#c 看到了，因為（偵察機）飛到上面（空中）。
#e Did they come over to Mhebu?
#c 喔來到.. 沒抵達馬赫坡（上空）？
#e No, they didn't. By that time, they had not come to Mhebu.
#c 沒來到（馬赫坡上空），那時還沒來（到馬赫坡上空）。
#e I see. At that moment did you still stay at home?
#c 是。是。那時妳還留在家裡嗎？
#e Yes, I stayed home.
#c 我留在家裡。
#e Did you sleep at home alone that night?
#c 那天晚上妳還是在自己家過夜嗎？
#e Yes, I still slept there.
#c 我還是在那裡睡。
#n hayan、han 「暫且」或「先」，兩者意義可依聲調起伏分別。
#e When it was the following day...  Pawan, when did the aircraft come to Mhebu?
#c 到了第二天.. ，Pawan（蔡茂琳），飛機飛到馬赫坡上空是什麼時候？
#n 詢問的內容到da為止，Pawan用來將焦點轉至蔡女士身上，請她回答。
#e It was exactly the following day.
#c 就是第二天了。
#n kii=kiya
#e They came on the following day.
#c 隔天來了。
#e So we all hung the (Japanese) flags.
#c 所以族人們說大家要懸掛(日本)旗子。
#e No, it wasn't at that time, Pawan.
#c 還不是那個時候哦 Pawan。
#e How come Suku people gathered there so quickly?
#c Suku的族人怎麼可能會那麼快在那兒集結?
#n kwana nak (how come so fast)「怎麼那麼快」。
#n Suku為部落名稱，郭老師翻為「斯固」部落，現已消失。
#e A bomb attack.
#c 炸彈。
#e It seems that the aircraft dropped the bombs.
#c 嗯... 那可能是飛機投下的炸彈。
#e The pans were scatterd all over the place.
#c 鍋子（炊具）到處散落（因炸彈爆炸所致）。
#n supih 煮湯用的平底鍋子，非炒菜用。
#e Is it because you had not ever seen any aircraft, our people just went to see them?
#c 你們是否... 是否由於（族人們）沒見過飛機，所以族人去觀看（飛機）？
#n d<m>eeda從高處眺望，或是仰望。
#n h<m>ili 主焦型，此處h省略。
#e That's right. We extended our heads out to see them.
#c 是的，因而去探頭看看。
#e Did our people wonder what that was in the sky?
#c 族人們以為（飛機）是何物？
#e Those who ate oranges did not escape. They were just eating oranges in the trees, watching the aircraft from there.
#c 在吃橘子的族人們就不躲藏，他們在橘子樹上吃著橘子，在那裡看著（飛機）。
#e They did not run away.
#c 他們沒逃開。
#e At that time, were there only people of Mhebu?
#c 當時僅是馬赫坡部落的族人嗎？
#e All of our people were there.
#c 所有的族人都在。
#e Did you already gather there?
#c 已聚集在一起了嗎？
#e All the people (of the six villages who protested against Japanese) gathered there.
#c 當時起義抗日的一組人馬(六個部落族人)都(在馬赫坡部落)聚集。
